H0.text: What is the name of the alternative medicine that uses essential oils. Essential Oil Therapy

H1.text: What is the name of the alternative medicine that uses essential oils. Olfactory Medicine

H2.text: What is the name of the alternative medicine that uses essential oils. Fragrance Healing

H3.text: What is the name of the alternative medicine that uses essential oils. Aromatherapy

A4.text: the name 'aromatherapy' first appeared in print in 1937 in a French book on the subject

A5.text: Aromatherapy is a practice based on the use of aromatic materials, including essential oils and other aroma compounds
